XXL.Chess.movement

Class Movement

  • java.lang.Object
    • XXL.Chess.movement.Movement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BishopMovement, CamelMovement, KingMovement, KnightMovement, PawnMovement, RookMovement

    public abstract class Movement
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing movement logic for chess pieces.

        public Movement(Tile[][] chessboard,

        Constructor for Movement class.

        chessboard - The 2D array of Tile objects representing the chessboard
        coordinate - The current coordinate for movement logic

    • Method Detail

      • getChessBoard

        public Tile[][] getChessBoard()
        Getter method to retrieve the chessboard.
        Returns:
        The 2D array of Tile objects representing the chessboard

      • getCoordinate

        public Vector2D getCoordinate()
        Getter method to retrieve the current coordinate for movement logic.
        Returns:
        The current coordinate as a Vector2D object

      • getKingCoordinate

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Boolean,ChessPiece> getKingCoordinate()
        Getter method to retrieve the HashMap containing king coordinates.
        Returns:
        HashMap where key is Boolean (true for white, false for black) and value is ChessPiece object

      • getPossibleMoves

        public abstract java.util.HashMap<Vector2D,int[]> getPossibleMoves(Vector2D vector)
        Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses to calculate possible moves for a chess piece.
        Parameters:
        vector - The vector representing the current position of the chess piece
        Returns:
        HashMap where key is Vector2D representing possible move and value is int array representing RGB color

      • getKing

        protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Boolean,ChessPiece> getKing()
        Method to find and return the coordinates of the kings on the chessboard.
        Returns:
        HashMap where key is Boolean (true for white, false for black) and value is ChessPiece object representing the king
